Text: Re Directions Cc We are playing at the same location directions are below and at the same time pm We need to have all the ladies show up or we forfeit Look forward to playing on Thursday Forwarded by Paul ChoiSFECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Michael E Vixie PM To cc Subject Re Directions Paul CSC is short for Child Services Center It is what used to be Washington High School The adress is SE th and Stark The gym is south of Stark between Stark and Morrison Mike From on PM To cc Subject Directions Mike Can I get the directions or address to tomorrows match for the Fractals I think it is at pm in the csc Also thanks for being flexible in changing our schedule Regards Paul

EPE AS Exercisensf When El Paso gets exercised for replacement reserves by the CAISO and they play the minute ramping games Dont call EPE to ramp down their generation if possible run an imbalance and receive the dec prices I have cleared this with EPE and John Forney If something happens to change this situation drop me a line Paul

dec bids for crcnsf CRC has a view that expost prices are going to be low for certain hours today and wants us to put in dec bids to pull energy out of the ISO under these conditions HE Volume MW Bid price Tiepoint LC Scheduling Fee per MWh If he is awarded give Bill Miller a call Also Paul Choi

Jimmy Maksnsf They are great they actually play every tuesday and thursday at Jimmy Maks I would love to go and I will try to drum up some support for it here We should probably get there before pm to secure good seats even though they start jamming around Paul Forwarded by Paul ChoiSFECT on PM SUZANNE NRON COMMUNICATIONS PM To Paul CT cc Subject Jimmy Maks This Thursday The Mel Brown Sextet is playing at Jimmy Maks I have no idea if they are any good but it may be fun Want to get a group together and check it out profile sv

Volleyball Leaguensf I attended a meeting yesterday for the volleyball league I have entered us in the coed E League teams which plays games on Thursday at pm or pm I have asked them schedule us for pm and they said they could accomodate us The league will start on April th for weeks and playoffs after that if we qualify The locations will be at various Portland High Schools which can vary from as close to Benson Tech to as far as St Johns The cost will be about per person and each person will receive a shirt I wanted to get a commitment now that we have all the information in and that you will be able to come to the games on consistent basis Please email Heather Dunton to confirm Paul Choi

FW Cc This is the premium we need to pay GRM for the unit contingent call option related to the Deseret Deal Paul Original Message From Williams Karin Sent Tuesday November AM To Choi Paul Cc Mcfarland Trena Bui Hang Subject FW Paul Will you please forward our bank information to the appropriate party Thanks Bank of America Acct aba Original Message From Mcfarland Trena Sent Tuesday November AM To Dusek Ryan Williams Karin Cc Choi Paul Subject Karin I agreed with Paul Choi that premium for the deseret deal would flow the next buisness day after thanksgiving The amount is Trena
Out of the Office Cc I will be in Houston from this Wednesday through Friday on business If you need to reach me call me on my mobile at Paul

FW FW Enron Economicspst Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Choi Paul Subject FW FW Enron Economics Here goes Buddy Have a safe trip Look forward to seeing you tomorrow If Stewart is coming tell him dress well Tripp THIS DOCUMENT IS NOT INTENDED TO CREATE A BINDING OFFER OR CONTRACT FOR THE PURCHASE ANDOR SALE OF ELECTRIC ENERGY OR CAPACITY BETWEEN RES AND RECIPIENT MOREOVER THIS DOCUMENT DOES NOT IN ANY WAY WHATSOEVER OBLIGATE EITHER OF THE PARTIES TO ENTER INTO ANY AGREEMENT OR TO PROCEED WITH ANY POSSIBLE RELATIONSHIP OR TRANSACTION EITHER PARTY MAY TERMINATE DISCUSSIONS ANDOR NEGOTIATIONS REGARDING THIS DOCUMENT AT ANY TIME WITHOUT LIABILITY TO THE OTHER PARTY THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH ABOVE ARE SUBJECT TO NEGOTIATION COMPLETION AND INCORPORATION INTO AND THE EXECUTION BY BOTH PARTIES OF A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT Forwarded by Marvin K BallardTTGHouInd on PM Charles Sommer scon To Tripp Ballard Email cretecom cc Subject FW FW Enron Economics AM This would be funnier if I hadnt lost so much money on their stock Original Message From Cyndie Beck Sent Friday November AM To Rob Hiegel Rod Rodriguez Charles Sommer Steve Proto Subject FW FW Enron Economics Social Studiesdoc See attached file Social Studiesdoc

RE Cc Here is my revised draft for our latest confirm I have updated th term strike prices premium and Index I think the one thing remaining is putting in the one day delay in the payout calculation Could you take a stab at that Also if you are indifferent on moving the exposure limits from our previous deal to this deal I would like to move MM from the old deal to the new The old deal will have MM remaining Call me to discuss Paul Choi Original Message From Mcfarland Trena Sent Friday November PM To Choi Paul Subject while I remember here is the confirm from the last deal File Desk Confirm Draftdoc

FW sparkspread callpst Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Choi Paul Subject RE sparkspread call Paul Here are the particulars again Term Volume MW Heat Rate MMBtu Mwh Index SoCal Delivery Mead LD Physical This would be on a x basis though we would consider a structure which would allow you the optionality to exercise peak on and off peak as seperate options Let me know what you think KR

FW NYMEXpst Original Message From mailto Sent Friday November PM To Choi Paul Subject Re NYMEX Paul Actually we are interested in a straight monthly puts probably MWs per month on our NYMEX position ie at the money monthly strikes with put premium for year paid within first business days after Curt Choi Paul Paul NRONcom AM Curt Are you interested in doing a similar structure for your NYMEX index positions We can incorporate the unit contingent component into the deal with how we did handled it in our previous transaction and also enhance it by paying you the difference between DJ index and NYMEX for when Bonanza goes down since you may be concerned that the NYMEX price you are receiving will not match the market prices that you may have to pay to replace the energy Give me a call to discuss this and I am getting the ball rolling on getting you a copy of the ISDA Best Regards Paul Choi This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
FW UAMPS Fallon Washington Blockspst Original Message From Tom Florence mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Choi Paul Subject UAMPS Fallon Washington Blocks The blocks repeat after year one tkf

RE Seagullpst Hey guys I am getting the tickets today at the box office I was thinking we get together for cocktails around at the Southpark Bar and Grill and can get you the tickets then If you cant make it before for drinks email me and I will get it to you before Paul Original Message From Choi Paul Sent Friday January PM To Erica Smock Rosman Stewart Motley Matt Thome Stephen Wente Laura Subject Seagull I got the tickets and was able to get a discount so the price is per ticket It is this thursday at pm We will probably get together for drinks prior to the show Paul

Housewarming Partypst We will be having a housewarming party this Friday starting around We will be grilling salmon burgers and chicken Also I will be opening a double magnum of chardonnay If you want something else to eat or drink bring it by and we will put it on the grill or ice Email me if you can come and how many are coming The following link is the directions to my place from the office  Paul

Sierra Pacific and Nevada Power Cc I would like to set up a time to talk about ways to alleviate our credit issues with them and any transaction structures to help their current cashflow problems Also there may be a larger scale risk management proposal that has been pitched in the past that could be shown to them again How does sometime this afternoon sound Paul
Seagullpst I got the tickets and was able to get a discount so the price is per ticket It is this thursday at pm We will probably get together for drinks prior to the show Paul

Seagullpst I have heard good things about this play and wanted to know if you are interested in watching this on Jan th Thursday at pm It is at the Center Stage and is per ticket for good seats You can find more about it at playsseagullshtml Tell me by tomorrow if you are interested and how many tickets you want Paul Choi

Proposal Cc Dave and Tom Attached below is our proposal for helping to buy back energy you may not need It incorporates netting out Washington and Fallon Volumes for the coinciding period It also provides prices for the period that overlaps your MW purchase from us and the cities needs beyond that period We can disaggregate this transaction but I thought it may make sense to net out volumes so you are not incurring transaction costs ie bidoffer spread for those volumes This is all delivered to Mona but I think we can get transmission to Gonder for Fallons energy requirements for a small premium from a variety of players The proposal is in spreadsheet format These are preliminary prices and a first crack at the structure so I want your feedback on how to enhance this proposal Happy Thanksgiving Paul Choi

FW Navy Power Purchase ContractPST Original Message From Penny Casey mailto Sent Monday January AM To Choi Paul Cc Mike Simonton Roy Tinsley Subject Navy Power Purchase Contract Paul at the Navys request could you notify Marino Crozat via email also copy Armando Abad Pete Barbot in the event of a change or interruption to deliveries for the Navys power purchase Email addresses are as follows Thanks Penny

FW EAFB PDA Additional Energy Scheduling ChangesPST Original Message From Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Emanuel Gregory G LtCol CESCC Cc Choi Paul Subject FW EAFB PDA Additional Energy Scheduling Changes Importance High Sir info Paul Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Cc Subject EAFB PDA Additional Energy Scheduling Changes Importance High Paul As I indicated in my followup call this afternoon the following procedure should be used to make any scheduling changes to the Basic WAPA Allocation Excess Energy or Additional Energy during the month in which a monthly preschedule was agreed by the parties prior to the beginning of the month Contact the SCE Day Ahead Prescheduling line at and inform them of the Scheduling Change and that the change will be confirmed via FAX or email Send a confirmation note with the Scheduling Change via FAX to or via email at As we have indicated in prior communications Edwards will be assessed an Additional Scheduling and Dispatch ASD charge currently for each change that is made to any of the Schedules This charge is in addition to the daily Scheduling and Dispatch charge of per day for each delivery point Mead Blythe and SP where energy is scheduled for delivery to SCE Please communicate this procedure to the Enron and WAPA energy scheduling folks Please let me know if you have any further questions Ray Haug Project Manager CSBU Technical Support

FW Phone Conference at LTC Emanuels Office Wednesday August PST This call is with Edwards and SCE to discuss selling back energy and Original Message From Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Choi Paul Cc Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE Emanuel Gregory G LtCol CESCC Subject FW Phone Conference at LTC Emanuels Office Wednesday August Sirs The dialin for the conference is Thanks Paul Original Message From Miller Cindy E Civ CESCC Sent Wednesday August AM To Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE Subject RE Phone Conference at LTC Emanuels Office Wednesday August number is Original Message From Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE Sent Tuesday August PM To Miller Cindy E Civ CESCC Cc Emanuel Gregory G LtCol CESCC Subject Phone Conference at LTC Emanuels Office Wednesday August Cindy Would you help me get a dialin for this please Thanks Paul

FW Resell of Edwards Excess Power for August PST Original Message From Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE mailto Sent Tuesday August AM To Choi Paul Weaver Paul Civ CEGCEOEE Cc Emanuel Gregory G LtCol CESCC Subject Resell of Edwards Excess Power for August Following is disseminated for information purposes For days of Aug Enron will resell Megawatts of onpeak AMPM For days Aug Enron will resell Megawatts of offpeak PMAM Paul Weaver Base Energy Manager CESCEOEE Edwards AFB

Revised Prices for MESA and ED Forwarded by Paul ChoiSFECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Paul Choi PM To cc Subject Revised Prices for MESA and ED Ken Prices have come off a more Forwarded by Paul ChoiSFECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Paul Choi AM To cc Subject Revised Prices for MESA and ED Ken I wanted to give you a pricing update Prices in the near term the next couple of years have come off Call me when you get some time Paul Choi Forwarded by Paul ChoiSFECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Paul Choi PM To cc Matt CT Dave CT Subject Revised Prices for MESA and ED Ken Attached is the revised pricing per our earlier discussion I want to emphasize the importance of having various suppliers provide you with competitive prices at a active trading hub like Palo Verde We would be happy to discuss with you how we can get you access to these competitive prices while maintaining reliable delivery to Mesas Preferred Delivery Points Please call me with any questions in regards to our proposal Best Regards Paul Choi
Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst We are going meet at pm today at Mt Hood to recap the meeting yesterday with Deseret and next steps for putting together a Services Proposal Paul Choi

FW Deseret MeetingBill NonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Choi Paul Sent Wednesday August AM To Williams Bill Subject FW Deseret Meeting Original Message From Choi Paul Sent Wednesday August AM To Foster Chris H Motley Matt Alonso Tom Fischer Mark Etringer Michael Subject Deseret Meeting Here is an agenda for todays meeting with Deseret DGT describes their organization and their resources and how they supply their load also their strategy on selling offsystem energy DGT will describe their current agreement with Pacificorp and what they would like to see in a new agreement Services Desk function and past experience with Service customers Basic functions that we would be able to provide them scheduling realtime function settlements meter reading billing etc Remarketing of their energy and marketmaking capabilities how we are able to capture value on a daily month and term basis Risk Management products unit insurance fixed price swaps and collars etc Market intelligence to help with their loadresource management for planning purposes and to maximize thri revenues from their nonmember sales Next steps Please provide any additional feedback on other issues you would like to talk about We will be meeting around noon or as soon as they arrive from the airport Paul Choi
UWUM TicketsBill NonPrivilegedpst Bill I have some friends who want to go to this game and would take any tickets you can spare Paul
Bill NonPrivilegedpst Kathy Cranes WAPA is
